CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Topics Adoption Metrics Dashboard
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Topics will include a new analytics page, where knowledge managers and admins will have access to a set of metrics that details the health of their adoption. Tenants will have health targets to reach to keep them on track for adopting Viva Topics, as well as recommended actions to perform to drive each metric to healthy.

CurrentVersion.title: Visio: View and edit shape data in Visio for the web
CurrentVersion.description: As part of our effort to enable data-linked diagrams in Visio for the web, this feature allows Visio Plan 1 and Visio Plan 2 subscribers to view and edit shape data fields in the Visio web editor for diagrams originally created in the Visio desktop app. Visio in Microsoft 365 users will be able to view shape data but will not be able to edit the data.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Enable second video stream with "Teams Content Camera on Desktop"
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to enable a second video stream to support both their Personal Video and Teams Content Camera on Desktop feature.  When enabling the Teams Content Camera on Desktop feature, the Personal Video is expected to be maintained so long that the user selects a separate Camera to support the two video streams. This feature will no longer be rolling out to classic Teams and will only be generally available in the new Teams experience with a revised Rollout Start schedule.

When enabling the Teams Content Camera on Desktop feature, the Personal Video is expected to be maintained so long that the user selects a separate Camera to support the two video streams. This feature will no longer be rolling out to classic Teams and will only be generally available in the new Teams experience with a revised Rollout Start schedule.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Topics engagement analytics in Topic center
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Usage and engagement analytics showing Topics adoption and value will be available to knowledge
managers in a new analytics tab in Topic center. Analytics will include Unique users and Usage counts for Topics usage activities all up; Unique users and Usage counts for Topics for consuming, contributing and sharing Topics activities; Usage count details for Topics consumption activities from Topic card, page, search, Topic center cards; Usage count details for Topics for contribution activities like Editing and publishing topics, providing feedback.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance – User scoping role-based access control (RBAC)
CurrentVersion.description: Delegate management and remediation authority for different people in different regions or organization units with role-based access control (RBAC).For example,– German investigators should be able to investigate messages for only German users; German administrators can only create/manage policies for only German users. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Progressive alert scoring
CurrentVersion.description:
,
With this new feature, user activities that could potentially result in data security incidents will be assessed more frequently within a 24-hour period compared with the current practice of once every 24 hours. Alert insights will now be updated every few hours with this increased frequency, providing designated analysts with timely alerts and continuously evolving insights. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: School Connection for parents in Microsoft Teams (mobile)
CurrentVersion.description:
The School Connection app in Microsoft Teams mobile empowers parents and guardians to engage, support, and monitor their student's learning at school. As a parent, you can stay up to date on assignments, grades, insights from the past month on digital activity, and more. CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- Global exclusions
CurrentVersion.description:
,With this update, all exclusion features currently found under intelligent detections will be relocated to a new tab labeled "Global exclusions" within the insider risk settings. All previously added exclusions in intelligent detections will be migrated to this new tab.
The functionality of exclusions remains unchanged. Moreover, admins with appropriate permissions can now add exclusion via defined detection groups, which contain similar entities like domains or file types. This new tab is designed to enhance usability and offers a convenient way to access and manage exclusions.
Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Video trim feature
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Stream (on SharePoint) will soon introduce a video trimming feature which will allow users with edit permissions to trim the start, end and any parts in the middle of a video.  When you trim a video, Stream won’t change the original video file itself. Instead, it just hides the trimmed parts from your viewers.  When you're done trimming you can toggle to the preview mode to see the trimmed video just like your viewers will see. When a video is trimmed the transcript and chapters will be adjusted automatically to reflect only what is shown in the video. People with edit permission will be able to see full original content and edit or delete those trimmed parts. When available this feature can be accessed by opening a video in the Stream web app and taping the edit button.

OldVersion.description:

won’t change the original video file itself. Instead, it just hides the trimmed
parts from your viewers.  When you're
done trimming you can toggle to the preview mode to see the trimmed video just
like your viewers will see. When a video is trimmed the transcript and chapters
will be adjusted automatically to reflect only what is shown in the video.
People with edit permission will be able to see full original content and edit
or delete those trimmed parts. When available this feature can be accessed by
opening a video in the Stream web app and taping the edit button.

OldVersion.description: In the Planner Teams app, your tasks will automatically appear in My Day on their due dates. This will help you stay on top of your priorities and stay organized throughout the day.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Manage all your tasks in My Tasks
CurrentVersion.description: My Tasks within the Planner Teams app shows your tasks across plans, projects, to-do lists and flagged emails so you can quickly triage and track all the work on your plate.

OldVersion.title: Planner: Manage all your tasks in My Tasks
OldVersion.description: My Tasks within the Planner Teams app shows your tasks across plans, projects, to-do lists and flagged emails so you can quickly triage and track all the work on your plate.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Access all your plans, projects and to do lists in My Plans
CurrentVersion.description: My Plans within the Planner app in Teams brings together all of your plans, projects and to do lists to help you easily discover and find all your work.

OldVersion.description:
My Plans within the

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365: Microsoft 365 Backup
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Microsoft 365 Backup Service is a product offering spanning across the OneDrive, SharePoint, and Exchange Online services that provides customers with a consistent, cross product solution, to recover their M365 data from cataclysmic events such as: at scale ransomware attacks, or malicious/accidental data deletion/corruption by end users. Microsoft 365 Backup Service is available on a pay-as-you-go basis and can be enabled through the Microsoft 365 admin center.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365: Microsoft 365 Backup
OldVersion.description: ,Microsoft 365 Backup Service is a product offering spanning across the OneDrive, SharePoint, and Exchange Online services that provides customers with a consistent, cross product solution, to recover their M365 data from cataclysmic events such as: at scale ransomware attacks, or malicious/accidental data deletion/corruption by end users. Microsoft 365 Backup Service is available on a pay-as-you-go basis and can be enabled through the Microsoft 365 admin center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) - Identify OneDrive site associated with an inactive mailbox for Custodians
CurrentVersion.description: When adding a Custodian in an eDiscovery (Premium) case, the OneDrive site associated with an inactive mailbox will now be auto populated to be created as a data source. This feature will be available for Custodians added through the Ux only.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) - Identify OneDrive site associated with an inactive mailbox for Custodians
OldVersion.description: When adding a Custodian in an eDiscovery (Premium) case, the OneDrive site associated with an inactive mailbox will now be auto populated to be created as a data source. This feature will be available for Custodians added through the Ux only.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Object Character Recognition (OCR) support for embedded images in Exchange Online and Microsoft Teams
CurrentVersion.description: We are extending the Object Character Recognition (OCR) for Exchange Online and Microsoft Teams in Microsoft Purview to support images embedded in more file types such as: Hybrid PDF files, which are PDF files with both images and searchable text,  Microsoft Office files with the extensions DOCX, PPTX, XLSX , Container files such as zip, rar, 7z, and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Private & shared channels links
CurrentVersion.description: Need to add your colleague to a channel discussion? Copy the link of a private or a shared channel, a channel post or one of its replies and share it with your partner, so they can join the discussion in one click.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Walkie Talkie Support for Multiple Channels
CurrentVersion.description: Walkie Talkie, a push-to-talk experience that enables clear and secure voice communication over the cloud, enables teams to communicate instantly on a channel. Through this new functionality, users can now join up to 5 channels in multi-channel mode, easily switch between these preselected channels to listen to incoming transmission or initiate PTT transmissions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention-Improving DLP Policy tip text for matched recipients in Outlook win32
CurrentVersion.description: ,We are updating the DLP Policy tip text in Outlook windows desktop client that appears when end users attempt to send a sensitive email to recipients who are not authorized by your organization's DLP policies. Users will soon receive a more gentle policy tip nudge to review recipients and content before sending email.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Organizers can select languages for translation in a town hall
CurrentVersion.description: Town hall organizers will be able to select the caption languages that will be available to the attendees for translation. Currently the languages are preset for attendees to pick from; now organizers will be able to select the six translated languages available to attendees.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Organizers can select languages for live translation for captions in a town hall
OldVersion.description: Organizers can select up to six languages for attendees to choose from for live translation for captions during a town hall.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap on Teams Mobile (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent recap is now available on Teams for iOS and Android, so users can access AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions, and easily browse the meeting recording by speakers. Intelligent recap features are also available as a part of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap on Teams Mobile (Premium)
OldVersion.description: Intelligent recap is now available on Teams for iOS and Android, so users can access AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions, and easily browse the meeting recording by speakers.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Tags will be supported in Private Channels
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now use team tags to @ mention groups of people in private channels.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Tags will be supported in Private Channels
OldVersion.description: Users can now use team tags to @ mention groups of people in private channels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Connections - Manage your organization’s brand in the new brand center
CurrentVersion.description: We’re introducing new branding and management capabilities that you can use to improve consistency across your Viva Connections desktop, mobile, and tablet experiences.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Introducing custom fonts for SharePoint and Viva Connections Desktop
CurrentVersion.description: Fonts are more than just letters and symbols, and we've heard you. We're bringing font customization to your SharePoint and Viva Connections experiences with the brand center. Express your personality, style, and brand by adding custom fonts to your sites and related experiences.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Create themes for SharePoint and Viva Connections in brand center
CurrentVersion.description: We're bringing a new theme creation experience into the brand center, allowing you to easily create and manage themes for your sites and related experiences.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Customize your Viva Connections experiences with fonts and themes
CurrentVersion.description: Site owners and operators will now be able to create branded fonts and themes for their sites and experiences in the brand center by combining the branding assets that the organization provides or by creating their own.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to duplicate an existing webinar for simplified event creation
CurrentVersion.description: Organizers can schedule a new webinar by duplicating information from an existing scheduled one. This includes duplicating information such as details, presenters, theming, and more. The organizer can also edit and update the information as needed for the new event.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Integration of Auto-Claim Policy for Licensing of Microsoft Loop and Microsoft Clipchamp in your Tenant
CurrentVersion.description: We're excited to announce an upcoming feature to enhance our Microsoft 365 offerings with a new, innovative auto-claim policy for Microsoft Loop and Microsoft Clipchamp. These two applications can be configured as a policy, allowing users with active base offerings like Microsoft 365 E3/E5 Original SKUs to automatically claim a Microsoft 365 Extra Features E3/E5 license when needed. As they engage with Microsoft Loop and Microsoft Clipchamp, a license from your tenant's pre-provisioned Microsoft 365 Extra Features E3/E5 SKU will be seamlessly assigned to them. This new feature is designed to simplify admin tasks and requirements.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Pay-as-you-go transcript translations
CurrentVersion.description:
Make your content more inclusive by creating videos that your coworkers can easily view and understand in their primary language. Transcript translations in Stream (on SharePoint) give you the option to translate the transcript and closed captions of your Stream videos into more than 100 supported languages. To enable translations Admins must first setup billing using an Azure subscription, then they must be enable the feature in the M365 Admin center. Once enabled translations are billed via pay-as-you-go meters.
More info: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/microsoft-syntex-pay-as-you-go-transcript-translations-in-stream-for-sharepoint-2e34ad1b-e213-47ed-a806-5cc0d88751de

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Introducing custom fonts for SharePoint
CurrentVersion.description: Fonts are more than just letters and symbols, and we've heard you. We're bringing font customization to your SharePoint and Viva Connections experiences with the brand center. Express your personality, style, and brand by adding custom fonts to your sites and related experiences.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Create themes for SharePoint in brand center
CurrentVersion.description: We're bringing a new theme creation experience into the brand center, allowing you to easily create and manage themes for your sites and related experiences.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Customize your individual sites and experiences with fonts and themes
CurrentVersion.description: Site owners will now be able to create branded fonts and themes for their sites and experiences in the brand center by combining the branding assets that the organization provides or by creating their own.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: To Do app opens in the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Use the To Do app without leaving the new Outlook for Windows! Click the To Do icon in the navigation bar to open inline without opening in a separate browser window.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Shared Mailboxes as Accounts
CurrentVersion.description: Shared Mailboxes can be added as Accounts in the new Outlook for Windows. The Shared Mailbox will appear at the Account Level in the Folder list. Access to the Shared Mailbox requires the user's credentials and associated permissions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance-Detect Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 interactions template
CurrentVersion.description: Communication Compliance is introducing a new template dedicated to analyzing all Copilot for Microsoft 365 prompts and responses, to help ensure content prohibited by customers’ policies, such as harassing or threatening language, is not being used Copilot for Microsoft 365 interfaces. This scales Communication Compliance’s reach, consistent with Microsoft 365’s expanding interfaces. In addition, administrators are also able to select Copilot chats as a checked location in the policy creation wizard for any new or existing policies. This empowers administrators to fine-tune their management strategy precisely to their organization’s needs, with a focus on user privacy protection. Whether it's setting specific conditions or deploying trainable classifiers, this feature provides flexibility and adaptability in compliance management, ensuring your organization's communications remain secure, compliant, and respectful of user privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Select the domain to choose for Teams Email Service
CurrentVersion.description: Admins will be able to select the domain to send emails to their users via Teams Email Service

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Organizers can select languages for translation in a town hall (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Town hall organizers will be able to select the caption languages that will be available to the attendees for translation. Currently the languages are preset for attendees to pick from; now organizers will be able to select the 10 translated languages available to attendees.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Join meetings and make calls on Android Auto
CurrentVersion.description: Teams on Android Auto lets you easily join meetings from the calendar view, quickly call your speed dial contacts and see your recent calls on your Android phones.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Forms: New user onboarding experience
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing an upgraded onboarding experience tailored for new Forms users, designed to provide a seamless and user-friendly initiation to the platform. Get started effortlessly with our refreshed interface and streamlined features.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Admin setting for uploading files using drag-drop
CurrentVersion.description: Admin will be able to control the default content app for local files uploaded using drag-drop in chat and channels. OneDrive / SharePoint are the existing default locations for uploads using drag-drop.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Ability to delete indicator variants
CurrentVersion.description: ,With this update, admins with appropriate permissions will be able to delete any of the indicator variants created. Deletion of variants will directly delete it from all the Insider Risk Management policies being used. Any old insights related to the variants will remain for future reference. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage question post update
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Engage is updating its questions to include two parts: a required field for the main question and an optional larger field for extra details.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to duplicate an existing town hall for simplified event creation
CurrentVersion.description: Organizers can schedule a new webinar by duplicating information from an existing scheduled one. This includes duplicating information such as details, presenters, theming, and more. The organizer can also edit and update the information as needed for the new event.

CurrentVersion.title: Excel: Track tasks with @mentions
CurrentVersion.description: Use @mentions in comments to create, assign and track tasks within your workbook.

OldVersion.title: Excel: Track tasks with @mentions
OldVersion.description: Use @mentions in comments to create, assign and track tasks within your workbook.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Topic engagement analytics
CurrentVersion.description:
,
This update will introduce usage and engagement analytics on topics (views, edits, etc.) to the Microsoft Admin Center.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Topic engagement analytics
OldVersion.description: ,This update will introduce usage and engagement analytics on topics (views, edits, etc.) to the Microsoft Admin Center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Reduce detection to investigation time from 24 hours to 1 hour
CurrentVersion.description:
,This feature will reduce the detection to investigation time to under an hour, allowing your organization to respond promptly to policy violations. The alert will be reviewed by a policy investigator, who is explicitly granted permission to review policy alerts by the Communication Compliance admin role.Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/communication-compliance-investigate-remediate?view=o365-worldwide

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview | Communication Compliance Empower end users to report inappropriate messages in Teams
CurrentVersion.description:
Microsoft Teams users are empowered to report inappropriate or concerning messages within Teams chat and channels. These reported messages are then submitted to a Communication Compliance policy for investigators to review and take action if deemed necessary. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/communication-compliance?view=o365-worldwide

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Suggested files in chats
CurrentVersion.description: Save time with AI-based file suggestions in chat. As an expansion of suggested replies in chats, Teams uses AI to surface files when it detects in the conversation intent to share a file. Now, users will be able to respond to their chat message and attach a file in one click. Note: The Government clouds release has been delayed. We will add a new roadmap item when appropriate. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. Additionally, this feature is only available in the new Teams experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Suggested files in chats
OldVersion.description: Save time with AI-based file suggestions in chat. As an expansion of suggested replies in chats, Teams uses AI to surface files when it detects in the conversation intent to share a file. Now, users will be able to respond to their chat message and attach a file in one click. Note: The Government clouds release has been delayed. We will add a new roadmap item when appropriate. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. Additionally, this feature is only available in the new Teams experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Graph API for Teams Meetings Transcripts
CurrentVersion.description: Graph API to access Teams Meetings transcript once the meeting is over.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Graph API for Teams Meetings Transcripts
OldVersion.description: Graph API to access Teams Meetings transcript once the meeting is over.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Topics Adoption Metrics Dashboard
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Topics will include a new analytics page, where knowledge managers and admins will have access to a set of metrics that details the health of their adoption. Tenants will have health targets to reach to keep them on track for adopting Viva Topics, as well as recommended actions to perform to drive each metric to healthy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Application management for Microsoft Edge
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Brings app layer management to Windows.  Supports app configuration and app protection for Microsoft Edge.  Includes app protection Conditional Access and Windows Defender integration.

CurrentVersion.title: Visio: View and edit shape data in Visio for the web
CurrentVersion.description: As part of our effort to enable data-linked diagrams in Visio for the web, this feature allows Visio Plan 1 and Visio Plan 2 subscribers to view and edit shape data fields in the Visio web editor for diagrams originally created in the Visio desktop app. Visio in Microsoft 365 users will be able to view shape data but will not be able to edit the data.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Enable second video stream with "Teams Content Camera on Desktop"
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to enable a second video stream to support both their Personal Video and Teams Content Camera on Desktop feature.  When enabling the Teams Content Camera on Desktop feature, the Personal Video is expected to be maintained so long that the user selects a separate Camera to support the two video streams. This feature will no longer be rolling out to classic Teams and will only be generally available in the new Teams experience with a revised Rollout Start schedule.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Topics engagement analytics in Topic center
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Usage and engagement analytics showing Topics adoption and value will be available to knowledge
managers in a new analytics tab in Topic center. Analytics will include Unique users and Usage counts for Topics usage activities all up; Unique users and Usage counts for Topics for consuming, contributing and sharing Topics activities; Usage count details for Topics consumption activities from Topic card, page, search, Topic center cards; Usage count details for Topics for contribution activities like Editing and publishing topics, providing feedback.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting participants time-zone
CurrentVersion.description: When scheduling a meeting with people from different time-zones, the user will be prompted with suggested start times and additional insights that correspond to the participants respective time-zone, ensuring a more suitable time for all meeting participants.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Exact Data Match to support multi-token corroborative evidence
CurrentVersion.description: Exact Data Match (EDM) will support string match detection of multi-token (i.e., fields with multiple words separated by spaces or punctuation) corroborative evidence without requiring mapping Sensitive Information Types (SITs) to multi-token corroborative evidence fields.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Support for static and adaptive policy scopes for auto-apply retention labels targeting SITs in Exchange
CurrentVersion.description: Auto-apply retention labels targeting sensitive information types in Exchange will now support static include/exclude and adaptive policy scopes. Previously admins could only target all Exchange mailboxes.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview: Data Loss Prevention - messages delivered to hosted Quarantine for Exchange Online is moving to quarantine page in Microsoft 365 Defender portal
CurrentVersion.description: The messages delivered to hosted quarantine matching a DLP policy is moving from Exchange transport rule to the Quarantine page in the Microsoft 365 Defender portal.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams Webinar Graph APIs
CurrentVersion.description: The Teams Webinar Graph APIs allows users to get webinar data like attendee names, attendance duration, registration, and registrant cancellations. This data can be exported to be used in 3P systems including CRMs, marketing automation tools, LOB and Workflow apps. These APIs are designed to support business-to-business workflows.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Live Translated Transcript (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Premium users can now view Live Transcript in their preferred languages during the meeting and choose to show the translated transcript with the original transcript as a reference.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Deploy Teams at Scale for frontline with dynamic teams.
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Deploy teams at scale for your frontline workers using dynamic teams in the Teams Admin Center. Dynamic teams will automate member management to ensure your teams are always up to date. Note: We are updating a release phase to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Pre-pin meeting apps via Admin Policy in the Teams admin center
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can now pre-pin meetings apps for users (much like personal apps and messaging extensions) in the Teams admin center

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Apply protection at the time of egress on endpoints (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: Extend protection to unclassified files on Windows endpoint by applying restrictions defined in DLP policies at the time of egress.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) - App Permissions for Graph API
CurrentVersion.description: ,Now organizations who are automating eDiscovery workflows will be able to authenticate and execute workflows with an application based authentication method.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance – User scoping role-based access control (RBAC)
CurrentVersion.description: Delegate management and remediation authority for different people in different regions or organization units with role-based access control (RBAC).For example,– German investigators should be able to investigate messages for only German users; German administrators can only create/manage policies for only German users. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Additional manager-controlled privacy settings in Shifts
CurrentVersion.description: We are releasing additional manager-controlled privacy settings in the Shifts app. Frontline managers will be able to set the level of visibility on Time off reason and notes for frontline workers and they can set how far in the past their employees can view data in schedule view, to manage employees' views of each other's breaks and notes.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Syntex: Translation
CurrentVersion.description: A new service that enables users to translate documents quickly and accurately among dozens of languages based on specific metadata or on-demand.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Self service for external benchmark consent
CurrentVersion.description: Improved self service; Admins can give consent to include results for Viva Glint external benchmarks.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Multiple external benchmarks
CurrentVersion.description: Organizations can now receive external benchmarks as part of the standard platform for comparison; Ability to enable multiple external benchmarks in reports

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Auto-follow when follow session initiated
CurrentVersion.description: Participants of a whiteboard will automatically start following a user that starts a follow session when it is initiated.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Open existing board in Teams with Follow
CurrentVersion.description: The ability to open an existing whiteboard in a Teams meeting with the follow feature already initiated. This allows users to share a whiteboard with follow enabled immediately.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Microsoft 365 Groups connected Viva Goals Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Users will now save time with a simplified set-up experience for setting up their Viva Goals Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: From the new Outlook for Windows, open Word, Excel, and PowerPoint attachments in desktop apps
CurrentVersion.description: From the new Outlook for Windows, users can now open Word, Excel, and PowerPoint attachments in their respective desktop apps by double clicking them.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - App Permissions for Graph API
CurrentVersion.description: Now organizations who are automating eDiscovery workflows will be able to authenticate and execute workflows with an application based authentication method.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Excel import enhancements in Shifts app
CurrentVersion.description: Frontline managers will gain the ability to import an Excel file into Shifts with time off and open shift entities. Complementary, those entities will also be supported when managers export schedules in a compatible format to import.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams Rooms on Windows All-in-one experience
CurrentVersion.description: With this update, Teams Rooms on Windows will support all-in-one and board device form factors, such as the Surface Hub 3.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams Rooms on Windows All-in-one experience
CurrentVersion.description: With this update, Teams Rooms on Windows will support all-in-one and board device form factors, such as the Surface Hub 3.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: One Time Passcode (OTP) for simplified setup of Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: This feature introduces a new and simplified way to setup Teams Room on Windows. During the first boot experience, the user will be presented with an option to enter an OTP to  automatically fetch the resource account credentials and sign into Teams Rooms. The users will need a pro license to utilize this feature and provision the OTPs on the Teams Rooms Pro Management Portal.

CurrentVersion.title: Visio: Support for layers in Visio for the web [Visio Plan 1, Plan 2]
CurrentVersion.description: Users with a Visio Plan 1 or Visio Plan 2 license can now use layers to group a related set of shapes in a drawing and change properties of all the layer members at once.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Simulation mode for DLP
CurrentVersion.description:
,
With this capability, Admins will be able to try a Microsoft Purview DLP policy, assess its impact, and fine tune the policy as required in an isolated experience. This will help Admins build confidence in the configuration of the policy and reduce the policy enforcement time.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Create up to 50 Viva Connections experiences within a tenant
CurrentVersion.description: Customers with Viva suite or Viva Communications and Communities license can create up to 50 distinct Connections experiences for their audience groups. This is currently limited to only 10 experiences.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New Microsoft Teams store now available in GCCH and DOD
CurrentVersion.description: Users in GCCH and DOD environment can now experience the newly redesigned Teams store including adding apps for personal use, getting intelligent recommendations - like featured apps, popular apps amongst your colleagues, etc., receiving editorial articles that address common scenarios from apps to get started in Teams to those best for educators, searching apps faster and easier with updated app categories. They can also use “Manage your apps” to update, remove, share or “get more apps”.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage Community Creation API
CurrentVersion.description:
,
The community creation API supports programmatic creation of Microsoft Viva Engage communities via the MS Graph platform.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Progressive alert scoring
CurrentVersion.description:
,
With this new feature, user activities that could potentially result in data security incidents will be assessed more frequently within a 24-hour period compared with the current practice of once every 24 hours. Alert insights will now be updated every few hours with this increased frequency, providing designated analysts with timely alerts and continuously evolving insights. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Visio: Containers in Visio for the web [Visio Plan 1, Plan 2]
CurrentVersion.description: Containers are a powerful tool for organizing and managing complex diagrams. Users with a Visio Plan 1 or Visio Plan 2 license will be able to use containers in Visio for the web to create professional-looking diagrams that are easy to understand and navigate.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Together mode and content share layout improvement
CurrentVersion.description: With the new layout, Together mode will be displayed under the shared content. The users will be able to see the participants in Together mode and shared content simultaneously in a completely new way. Full Together mode experience is available including raised hands, reactions and name labels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: School Connection for parents in Microsoft Teams (mobile)
CurrentVersion.description:
The School Connection app in Microsoft Teams mobile empowers parents and guardians to engage, support, and monitor their student's learning at school. As a parent, you can stay up to date on assignments, grades, insights from the past month on digital activity, and more. This release will be generally available to all regions except countries in Europe, Middle East and Africa; the GA for those countries will be coming at a later date.


More info: https://parent.microsoft.com/

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Presence is back to Outlook on the Web
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Presence will be shown in Compose and read scenarios for recipients, co-recipients, and sender. The bubble indicators will provide contact's status and help you decide the best way to communicate with them.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Global Address List updates in new Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the Web
CurrentVersion.description: We are making some adjustments to the GAL search and browse experiences. Users will be asked to type in more characters to refine their search in some cases. There will be some other visual improvements in error messaging. Another way to find recipients is by using the suggestion dropdown picker in the To/Cc/Bcc lines. Note: We have updated the status and release date to reflect the current status.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- Global exclusions
CurrentVersion.description:
,With this update, all exclusion features currently found under intelligent detections will be relocated to a new tab labeled "Global exclusions" within the insider risk settings. All previously added exclusions in intelligent detections will be migrated to this new tab.
The functionality of exclusions remains unchanged. Moreover, admins with appropriate permissions can now add exclusion via defined detection groups, which contain similar entities like domains or file types. This new tab is designed to enhance usability and offers a convenient way to access and manage exclusions.
Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap for transcript-only meetings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent recap will support meetings with only transcript enabled, and without recording enabled. In the case when only transcript is enabled for a meeting, the features from intelligent recap that users can access are AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap for transcript-only meetings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent recap will support meetings with only transcript enabled, and without recording enabled. In the case when only transcript is enabled for a meeting, the features from intelligent recap that users can access are AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions. Intelligent recap features are also available as a part of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap for scheduled channel meetings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent recap is now available for scheduled channel meetings, so users can easily browse the meeting recording by speakers and topics, as well as access AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions. Intelligent recap features are also available as a part of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Video trim feature
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Stream (on SharePoint) will soon introduce a video trimming feature which will allow users with edit permissions to trim the start, end and any parts in the middle of a video.  When you trim a video, Stream won’t change the original video file itself. Instead, it just hides the trimmed parts from your viewers.  When you're done trimming you can toggle to the preview mode to see the trimmed video just like your viewers will see. When a video is trimmed the transcript and chapters will be adjusted automatically to reflect only what is shown in the video. People with edit permission will be able to see full original content and edit or delete those trimmed parts. When available this feature can be accessed by opening a video in the Stream web app and taping the edit button.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Add premium capabilities to Planner
CurrentVersion.description: Add premium capabilities like sprint planning, people view, goals, custom fields, and task history to your plans within the Planner Teams app.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Create personal plans in Planner
CurrentVersion.description: Create personal plans in the new Planner app for Teams. For these types of plans, the creator of the plan is the only member and owner.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Auto population of due tasks in My Day
CurrentVersion.description: In the Planner Teams app, your tasks will automatically appear in My Day on their due dates. This will help you stay on top of your priorities and stay organized throughout the day.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Manage all your tasks in My Tasks
CurrentVersion.description: My Tasks within the Planner Teams app shows your tasks across plans, projects, to-do lists and flagged emails so you can quickly triage and track all the work on your plate.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Access all your plans, projects and to do lists in My Plans
CurrentVersion.description: My Plans within the Planner app in Teams brings together all of your plans, projects and to do lists to help you easily discover and find all your work.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365: Microsoft 365 Backup
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Microsoft 365 Backup Service is a product offering spanning across the OneDrive, SharePoint, and Exchange Online services that provides customers with a consistent, cross product solution, to recover their M365 data from cataclysmic events such as: at scale ransomware attacks, or malicious/accidental data deletion/corruption by end users. Microsoft 365 Backup Service is available on a pay-as-you-go basis and can be enabled through the Microsoft 365 admin center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) - Identify OneDrive site associated with an inactive mailbox for Custodians
CurrentVersion.description: When adding a Custodian in an eDiscovery (Premium) case, the OneDrive site associated with an inactive mailbox will now be auto populated to be created as a data source. This feature will be available for Custodians added through the Ux only.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Object Character Recognition (OCR) support for embedded images in Exchange Online and Microsoft Teams
CurrentVersion.description: We are extending the Object Character Recognition (OCR) for Exchange Online and Microsoft Teams in Microsoft Purview to support images embedded in more file types such as: Hybrid PDF files, which are PDF files with both images and searchable text,  Microsoft Office files with the extensions DOCX, PPTX, XLSX , Container files such as zip, rar, 7z, and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Private & shared channels links
CurrentVersion.description: Need to add your colleague to a channel discussion? Copy the link of a private or a shared channel, a channel post or one of its replies and share it with your partner, so they can join the discussion in one click.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Walkie Talkie Support for Multiple Channels
CurrentVersion.description: Walkie Talkie, a push-to-talk experience that enables clear and secure voice communication over the cloud, enables teams to communicate instantly on a channel. Through this new functionality, users can now join up to 5 channels in multi-channel mode, easily switch between these preselected channels to listen to incoming transmission or initiate PTT transmissions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention-Improving DLP Policy tip text for matched recipients in Outlook win32
CurrentVersion.description: ,We are updating the DLP Policy tip text in Outlook windows desktop client that appears when end users attempt to send a sensitive email to recipients who are not authorized by your organization's DLP policies. Users will soon receive a more gentle policy tip nudge to review recipients and content before sending email.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Organizers can select languages for translation in a town hall
CurrentVersion.description: Town hall organizers will be able to select the caption languages that will be available to the attendees for translation. Currently the languages are preset for attendees to pick from; now organizers will be able to select the six translated languages available to attendees.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap on Teams Mobile (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent recap is now available on Teams for iOS and Android, so users can access AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions, and easily browse the meeting recording by speakers.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap on Teams Mobile (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent recap is now available on Teams for iOS and Android, so users can access AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions, and easily browse the meeting recording by speakers. Intelligent recap features are also available as a part of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Tags will be supported in Private Channels
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now use team tags to @ mention groups of people in private channels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Connections - Manage your organization’s brand in the new brand center
CurrentVersion.description: We’re introducing new branding and management capabilities that you can use to improve consistency across your Viva Connections desktop, mobile, and tablet experiences.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Introducing custom fonts for SharePoint and Viva Connections Desktop
CurrentVersion.description: Fonts are more than just letters and symbols, and we've heard you. We're bringing font customization to your SharePoint and Viva Connections experiences with the brand center. Express your personality, style, and brand by adding custom fonts to your sites and related experiences.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Create themes for SharePoint and Viva Connections in brand center
CurrentVersion.description: We're bringing a new theme creation experience into the brand center, allowing you to easily create and manage themes for your sites and related experiences.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Customize your Viva Connections experiences with fonts and themes
CurrentVersion.description: Site owners and operators will now be able to create branded fonts and themes for their sites and experiences in the brand center by combining the branding assets that the organization provides or by creating their own.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to duplicate an existing webinar for simplified event creation
CurrentVersion.description: Organizers can schedule a new webinar by duplicating information from an existing scheduled one. This includes duplicating information such as details, presenters, theming, and more. The organizer can also edit and update the information as needed for the new event.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Integration of Auto-Claim Policy for Licensing of Microsoft Loop and Microsoft Clipchamp in your Tenant
CurrentVersion.description: We're excited to announce an upcoming feature to enhance our Microsoft 365 offerings with a new, innovative auto-claim policy for Microsoft Loop and Microsoft Clipchamp. These two applications can be configured as a policy, allowing users with active base offerings like Microsoft 365 E3/E5 Original SKUs to automatically claim a Microsoft 365 Extra Features E3/E5 license when needed. As they engage with Microsoft Loop and Microsoft Clipchamp, a license from your tenant's pre-provisioned Microsoft 365 Extra Features E3/E5 SKU will be seamlessly assigned to them. This new feature is designed to simplify admin tasks and requirements.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Pay-as-you-go transcript translations
CurrentVersion.description:
Make your content more inclusive by creating videos that your coworkers can easily view and understand in their primary language. Transcript translations in Stream (on SharePoint) give you the option to translate the transcript and closed captions of your Stream videos into more than 100 supported languages. To enable translations Admins must first setup billing using an Azure subscription, then they must be enable the feature in the M365 Admin center. Once enabled translations are billed via pay-as-you-go meters.
More info: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/microsoft-syntex-pay-as-you-go-transcript-translations-in-stream-for-sharepoint-2e34ad1b-e213-47ed-a806-5cc0d88751de

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Introducing custom fonts for SharePoint
CurrentVersion.description: Fonts are more than just letters and symbols, and we've heard you. We're bringing font customization to your SharePoint and Viva Connections experiences with the brand center. Express your personality, style, and brand by adding custom fonts to your sites and related experiences.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Create themes for SharePoint in brand center
CurrentVersion.description: We're bringing a new theme creation experience into the brand center, allowing you to easily create and manage themes for your sites and related experiences.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Customize your individual sites and experiences with fonts and themes
CurrentVersion.description: Site owners will now be able to create branded fonts and themes for their sites and experiences in the brand center by combining the branding assets that the organization provides or by creating their own.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: To Do app opens in the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Use the To Do app without leaving the new Outlook for Windows! Click the To Do icon in the navigation bar to open inline without opening in a separate browser window.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Shared Mailboxes as Accounts
CurrentVersion.description: Shared Mailboxes can be added as Accounts in the new Outlook for Windows. The Shared Mailbox will appear at the Account Level in the Folder list. Access to the Shared Mailbox requires the user's credentials and associated permissions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance-Detect Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 interactions template
CurrentVersion.description: Communication Compliance is introducing a new template dedicated to analyzing all Copilot for Microsoft 365 prompts and responses, to help ensure content prohibited by customers’ policies, such as harassing or threatening language, is not being used Copilot for Microsoft 365 interfaces. This scales Communication Compliance’s reach, consistent with Microsoft 365’s expanding interfaces. In addition, administrators are also able to select Copilot chats as a checked location in the policy creation wizard for any new or existing policies. This empowers administrators to fine-tune their management strategy precisely to their organization’s needs, with a focus on user privacy protection. Whether it's setting specific conditions or deploying trainable classifiers, this feature provides flexibility and adaptability in compliance management, ensuring your organization's communications remain secure, compliant, and respectful of user privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Select the domain to choose for Teams Email Service
CurrentVersion.description: Admins will be able to select the domain to send emails to their users via Teams Email Service

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Organizers can select languages for translation in a town hall (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Town hall organizers will be able to select the caption languages that will be available to the attendees for translation. Currently the languages are preset for attendees to pick from; now organizers will be able to select the 10 translated languages available to attendees.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Join meetings and make calls on Android Auto
CurrentVersion.description: Teams on Android Auto lets you easily join meetings from the calendar view, quickly call your speed dial contacts and see your recent calls on your Android phones.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Forms: New user onboarding experience
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing an upgraded onboarding experience tailored for new Forms users, designed to provide a seamless and user-friendly initiation to the platform. Get started effortlessly with our refreshed interface and streamlined features.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Admin setting for uploading files using drag-drop
CurrentVersion.description: Admin will be able to control the default content app for local files uploaded using drag-drop in chat and channels. OneDrive / SharePoint are the existing default locations for uploads using drag-drop.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Ability to delete indicator variants
CurrentVersion.description: ,With this update, admins with appropriate permissions will be able to delete any of the indicator variants created. Deletion of variants will directly delete it from all the Insider Risk Management policies being used. Any old insights related to the variants will remain for future reference. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage question post update
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Engage is updating its questions to include two parts: a required field for the main question and an optional larger field for extra details.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to duplicate an existing town hall for simplified event creation
CurrentVersion.description: Organizers can schedule a new webinar by duplicating information from an existing scheduled one. This includes duplicating information such as details, presenters, theming, and more. The organizer can also edit and update the information as needed for the new event.

CurrentVersion.title: Excel: Track tasks with @mentions
CurrentVersion.description: Use @mentions in comments to create, assign and track tasks within your workbook.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Topic engagement analytics
CurrentVersion.description:
,
This update will introduce usage and engagement analytics on topics (views, edits, etc.) to the Microsoft Admin Center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Reduce detection to investigation time from 24 hours to 1 hour
CurrentVersion.description:
,This feature will reduce the detection to investigation time to under an hour, allowing your organization to respond promptly to policy violations. The alert will be reviewed by a policy investigator, who is explicitly granted permission to review policy alerts by the Communication Compliance admin role.Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/communication-compliance-investigate-remediate?view=o365-worldwide

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview | Communication Compliance Empower end users to report inappropriate messages in Teams
CurrentVersion.description:
Microsoft Teams users are empowered to report inappropriate or concerning messages within Teams chat and channels. These reported messages are then submitted to a Communication Compliance policy for investigators to review and take action if deemed necessary. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/communication-compliance?view=o365-worldwide

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  eDiscovery (Premium) – Hold reports
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Out-of-the-box reports that contain information about all legal holds associated with eDiscovery cases in the Microsoft Purview compliance portal. Sort and filter your view based on various criteria and download the aggregated information for further analysis.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  eDiscovery (Premium) – Hold reports (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: Out-of-the-box reports that contain information about all legal holds associated with eDiscovery cases in the Microsoft Purview compliance portal. Sort and filter your view based on various criteria and download the aggregated information for further analysis.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Reduce detection to investigation time from 24 hours to 1 hour (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description:
This feature will reduce the detection to investigation time to under an hour, allowing your organization to respond promptly to policy violations. The alert will be reviewed by a policy investigator, who is explicitly granted permission to review policy alerts by the Communication Compliance admin role. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/communication-compliance-investigate-remediate?view=o365-worldwide

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Suggested files in chats
CurrentVersion.description: Save time with AI-based file suggestions in chat. As an expansion of suggested replies in chats, Teams uses AI to surface files when it detects in the conversation intent to share a file. Now, users will be able to respond to their chat message and attach a file in one click. Note: The Government clouds release has been delayed. We will add a new roadmap item when appropriate. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. Additionally, this feature is only available in the new Teams experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Graph API for Teams Meetings Transcripts
CurrentVersion.description: Graph API to access Teams Meetings transcript once the meeting is over.
